QuestData.Title: Chasing Waterfalls
QuestData.Description:
The real threat lies in the Emberslate Cavern. This is where they carve those runestones and infuse them with primal fire.
No doubt you noticed the blazing wall of flame that blocks the entrance. I cannot dispel it, however I may be able to do something to help. I believe that with the proper application of Fallingwater, we can pass through it safely.
Harvest water motes from the nearby elementals.
QuestData.RewardText:
<Maldra examines the Fallingwater Motes.>
Yes, these should do nicely.
